perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Fees for Customizations:
[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of 50% of the amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction. Originally, if the price increased, Bank of America would receive a full refund. Now, they only receive 50% of the previously paid amount, creating uncertainty about the actual refund policy upon price increases.
